items.name: Hunting Knife
items.description: A sharp hunting knife used for skinning animals and cutting through tough hides. The blade has seen many uses but still holds an edge.

items.name: Trap
items.description: A simple snare trap, used to capture small game. Lightweight and easy to carry, it can be set up quickly in the wild.

items.name: Arrows
items.description: A quiver filled with sharp hunting arrows, perfect for ranged combat or bringing down prey from a distance.

items.name: Rations
items.description: A supply of dried meat, nuts, and berries, perfect for surviving in the wilderness during long hunting trips.

items.name: Camouflage Cloak
items.description: A cloak made of natural materials that blend in with the surrounding environment, providing extra stealth when hunting or avoiding detection.

items.name: Black Ritual Dagger
items.description: A dark ceremonial dagger used in the cult's rituals. Its blade is forged from obsidian and is rumored to hold sinister powers.

items.name: Candle of Everdark
items.description:
A candle that burns with an eerie, pale flame. It is said to reveal hidden truths when burned in the dark.

Effect: Reveals hidden objects or symbols.

items.name: Blood Vial
items.description:
A small vial filled with blood, used in the dark rites of the cult. Drinking it may grant forbidden power, but at a cost.

Effect: Temporary increase in dark powers, but causes corruption over time.

items.name: Cultist Robes
items.description: The dark robes of a cultist, embroidered with arcane symbols and sigils. Provides some protection against magical effects.

items.name: Pentagram Amulet
items.description: An amulet shaped like an inverted pentagram, said to protect its wearer from the forces of good.

items.name: Assorted Gems
items.description: A collection of various gemstones, each one valuable in its own right. Some may be used as currency, others may be traded for rare items.

items.name: Fine Silk
items.description: A bolt of fine silk fabric, used to craft luxurious clothing or other delicate items.

items.name: Gold Coins
items.description: A small pouch filled with glittering gold coins. Enough to buy a horse, pay for a month's worth of supplies, or hire a mercenary.

items.name: Merchant's Ledger
items.description: A small book containing records of transactions and debts. Essential for any merchant looking to keep their business in order.

items.name: Compass
items.description: A finely crafted compass, essential for navigating unknown territories and avoiding getting lost.

items.name: Rope
items.description: A length of strong rope, useful for climbing, tying up prisoners, or securing items during travel.

items.name: Torch
items.description: A bundle of torches, useful for lighting your way through dark caves, ruins, or forests. Essential for any serious explorer.

items.name: Explorer's Journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal, used by explorers to record their discoveries and map out uncharted lands.

items.name: Lockpicks
items.description: A set of finely crafted lockpicks, essential for any thief looking to open locked doors, chests, or safes.

items.name: Smoke Bomb
items.description:
A small bomb filled with a dense, black smoke. Useful for creating a distraction and making a quick escape.

Effect: Creates a cloud of smoke, obscuring vision for a short time.

items.name: Poisoned Dagger
items.description: A small dagger coated with a deadly poison. Used for silent, lethal attacks.

items.name: Gold Coins
items.description: A small pouch containing 20 gold coins. Thieves rarely keep their money for long, but this is a nice stash for the moment.

items.name: Lute
items.description: A finely crafted lute, a source of both entertainment and power. Can be played to charm or rally allies in battle.

items.name: Songs of the Old Gods
items.description: An old, tattered songbook containing forgotten ballads and epic tales of the gods. Can be used to inspire those around you.

items.name: Magic Flute
items.description: A flute imbued with a magical charm. When played, it can summon creatures or calm the hearts of the most fearsome foes.

items.name: Silver Coins
items.description: A small pouch of silver coins, enough to pay for a night's stay at an inn or buy a drink at the tavern.
